required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Effect of DS-8201a on the QT/QTc Interval in HER2-Expressing Breast Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1, Multicenter, Open-label, Multiple-dose Study of DS-8201a to Assess the Effect on the QT Interval and Pharmacokinetics in Subjects With HER2-expressing Metastatic and/or Unresectable Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This study will look at the effect of DS-8201a on heart rate and the movement of the drug through the body (pharmacokinetics) in participants with a certain type of breast cancer (HER2).

primary_outcome.measure: Average baseline-adjusted QT interval corrected for heart rate by Fridericia's formula (QTcF )
primary_outcome.description: The QT intervals will be corrected for heart rate by Fridericia's formula (QTcF = QT/[RR]1/3). The baseline QTcF interval for each subject will be subtracted from QTcF interval to create a baseline-adjusted QTcF interval.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Categories: DS-8201a, total anti-HER2 antibody, and MAAA-1181a

primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Categories: DS-8201a, total anti-HER2 antibody, and MAAA-1181a Tmax is the time it takes to reach the maximum concentration

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the drug concentration time curve (AUC) at the last observation (AUClast)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Categories: DS-8201a, total anti HER2 antibody, and MAAA-1181a

primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Categories: DS-8201a, total anti HER2 antibody, and MAAA-1181a AUCinf is calculated as the area under the curve from time 0 to infinity

primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Categories: DS-8201a, total anti HER2 antibody, and MAAA-1181a T1/2 is the time it takes for half of the drug to leave the body

primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: CL is derived from the curve of concentration versus time

primary_outcome.measure: Volume of DS-8201a at steady state (Vss)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Samples collected: Cycles 1 and 3 (Days 1, 2, 4, 8,15, 22); Cycles 2, 4, 6 and 8 (Days 1 and 22)
primary_outcome.description: Vss is the apparent volume of distribution at steady state

secondary_outcome.description: ORR is defined as the percentage of participants who achieve a best overall response of complete response (CR) or partial response (PR), as assessed by the investigator based on Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1
DCR is defined as the percentage of participants who achieve a best overall response of CR or PR or stable disease (SD)

arm_group.description: All participants will receive DS-8201a by intravenous infusion

intervention.description: DS-8201a is supplied as a lyophilized powder which is reconstituted for infusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Has a pathologically documented unresectable or metastatic breast cancer with HER2 expression (immunohistochemistry [IHC] 3+, IHC 2+, IHC 1+ and/or in situ hybridization [ISH] +) that is refractory to or intolerable with standard treatment, or for which no standard treatment is available
- Has a left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) â‰¥ 50%
- Has an Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status (ECOG PS) score of 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Has a medical history of myocardial infarction within 6 months before enrollment
- Has a medical history of ventricular arrhythmias, other than rare occasional premature ventricular contractions
- Has uncontrolled or significant cardiovascular disease
- Has any other history or condition that might compromise:
1. Safety of the participant or offspring
2. Safety of study staff
3. Analysis of Results

patient_data.ipd_description: De-identified individual participant data (IPD) and applicable supporting clinical trial documents may be available upon request at https://www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com//. In cases where clinical trial data and supporting documents are provided pursuant to our company policies and procedures, Daiichi Sankyo will continue to protect the privacy of our clinical trial participants. Details on data sharing criteria and the procedure for requesting access can be found at this web address: https://www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com/Study-Sponsors/Study-Sponsors-DS.aspx
